claim: Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).
explanation: CONSORT diagram for Year 2 (2019–2020) screening and enrollment of participants, showing numbers re-enrolled from Year 1 and new enrollees randomized into arms labeled IIV4 (inactivated influenza vaccine: Fluzone® or Fluarix® Quadrivalent), ccIIV4 (cell culture–based IIV4), and RIV4 (recombinant hemagglutinin influenza vaccine, Flublok® Quadrivalent), with subsequent re-randomization into various vaccine sequences. does not support the claim because the figure only depicts enrollment and randomization into IIV4, ccIIV4, and RIV4 arms without presenting a clear, direct head-to-head evaluation of Flublok® Quadrivalent against Fluarix® Quadrivalent in a pivotal trial. Note: The diagram focuses on participant flow and vaccine sequence arms; it does not include study outcomes or explicit mention of a pivotal comparison between Flublok and Fluarix.
